{
  "schemaVersion": "2.2",
  "description": "Splunk Forwarder Agent Upgrade",
  "parameters": {
    "SplunkAgentFileName": {
      "default": "splunkforwarder-9.0.2-17e00c557dc1-Linux-x86_64.tgz",
      "description": "Insert latest Splunk agent version stored in ecs-infra-common S3 bucket",
      "type": "String"
    },
    "SplunkVersion": {
      "default": "9.0.2",
      "description": "Latest version of Splunk forwarder version available to install",
      "type": "String"
    }
  },
  "mainSteps": [
    {
      "inputs": {
        "timeoutSeconds": 7200,
        "runCommand": [
          "#!/bin/bash",
          "sudo su -",
          "if [ -e /opt/splunkforwarder/bin/splunk ]; then",
          "    version=$(cat /opt/splunkforwarder/etc/splunk.version | grep VERSION | cut -d \"=\" -f2)",
          "    if [ $version != '{{SplunkVersion}}' ]; then",
          "       echo \"Upgrading splunk\" ",
          "       echo \"Creating configuration backup\" ",
          "       if [ -e /opt/splunkforwarder/splunkforwarder_config_backup.tar ]; then ",
          "          mv splunkforwarder_config_backup.tar splunkforwarder_config_backup.tar.old || true ",
          "          tar -cvpf splunkforwarder_config_backup.tar /opt/splunkforwarder/etc || true ",
          "       else ",
          "           tar -cvpf splunkforwarder_config_backup.tar /opt/splunkforwarder/etc || true ",
          "       fi ",
          "       echo \"Stopping splunk agent service.\" ",
          "       /opt/splunkforwarder/bin/splunk stop",
          "       echo \"Downloading new splunk forwarder version.\" ",
          "       aws s3 cp s3://ecs-infra-common/SplunkUF/'{{SplunkAgentFileName}}' /tmp && tar -xf /tmp/'{{SplunkAgentFileName}}' -C /opt && rm /tmp/'{{SplunkAgentFileName}}' || true",
          "       chown -R ec2-user:ec2-user /opt/splunkforwarder || true",
          "       echo \"Starting splunk agent service.\" ",
          "       /opt/splunkforwarder/bin/splunk start --accept-license --answer-yes || true",
          "   else ",
          "       echo \"Splunk is already up to date.\" ",
          "   fi ",
          "else ",
          "    echo \"Splunk is not installed.\" ",
          "fi"
        ]
      },
      "name": "PatchLinux",
      "action": "aws:runShellScript",
      "precondition": {
        "StringEquals": [
          "platformType",
          "Linux"
        ]
      }
    }
  ]
}
Name: arn:aws:ssm:us-west-2:050730830215:document/Splunk_Forwarder_Agent_Upgrade
